Sinon has four children that are married and live outside family home, one child  who sells clothes, and another child who works in a garment factory. 

She hopes to continue her weaving business and has applied for a loan to buy silk material.

loans.use: to buy silk for her weaving business.

loans.name: Menn

texts.en:
Menn is a weaver, while her husband sells cotton and silk fabrics. He buys these fabrics from a weaver in the village, and he transports the fabrics to sell in other provinces. 

Menn lives on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh. She has two daughters who work for hotels. And she also has one nephew living with her. 

Menn’s nephew is a third year student, majoring in Management. In addition, he also is employed in a hotel when he is not at school. He wants to buy a computer which would be useful in his studies for researching, doing assignments and so on. 

Hence Menn decided to apply for a loan to buy a computer for her nephew and she will also use a part of the loan to purchase weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.use: To buy a computer for her nephew.

loans.name: Madonna

texts.en:
Madonna is 26 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requests 20,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase soap, shampoo, sugar, and canned goods.

Madonna has borrowed and repaid 3 previous loans from NWTF. She has run the general store for 5 years and earns additional income raising chickens.

Madonna aspires to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase soap, shampoo, sugar, and canned goods.

loans.name: David

texts.es: David, de 36 años de edad, está casado con Evila y juntos tienen  04 hijos menores de edad, juntos viven cómodamente en su casa propia. David se dedica a brindar el transporte de pasajeros en un mototaxi que se compró con el fruto de sus ahorros. Anteriormente trabajaba como chofer de otro motocarro pero desde hace 1 año tiene su mototaxi propio y trabaja como cómodamente, sin embargo la calidad de su vehiculo no es el ideal ya que lo compró usado y requiere ciertas reparaciones. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual poder solventar sus gastos familiares. Se inició por la necesidad de contar con un trabajo propio ya que siempre le cerraban las puertas en locales donde se presentaba para trabajar y no podía conseguir un empleo estable. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000 se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que viene recibiendo para poder alcanzar sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado refaccionará su mototaxi comprando algunos repuestos y accesorios que necesita para continuar trabajando como espejo, llantas nuevas y tapizado.
texts.en: David is 36 years old. He is married to Evila and together they have 4 children younger in age. Together they live comfortably in their own house. David provides passenger transportation for a living via a motorcycle taxi that he bought with savings. Previously he worked as a driver of another rickshaw but he has had his own taxi for a year and works as comfortably. However, the quality of his vehicle is not ideal as he bought it used and it needs certain repairs. He likes his business because it allows him an income with which he can meet his family expenses. It was initiated by the need for a job, as doors were always closing and he was not able to get stable employment. This time he is requesting $375. He is very grateful for the financial support that he is receiving to help him achieve his goals. With the amount requested he will refurbish his motorcycle taxi buying some parts and accessories that he needs to continue working like a mirror, new tires, and upholstery.

loans.use: to buy parts and accessories like a mirror, new tires and upholstery.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is a 48-year-old married woman with seven children from Nocnocan, Talibon. 

Estrella runs a sari-sari (retail store) business selling various goods and items to the people in her community. She also runs a small restaurant.

This business has been her source of income for more than 15 years.  Estrella asks for a loan to buy canned goods, candies, soda, beverages, meat, vegetables, and seasonings. 

With this loan, Estrella will be able to improve her stock and also cook more food to sell. In the future, Estrella hopes to make her business a success. Furthermore, she wants to save money for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, candies, soda, beverages, meat, vegetables, and seasonings

loans.name: Marlito

texts.en:
Marlito is a 30-year-old married man and a father of two children from Getafe, Bohol. He has been engaged in a motorcycle transport business for more than 5 years now. Marlito is also engaged in a rice farming business.

Marlito is now requesting a loan to buy spare parts for his motorcycle, such as wheels, tires, chains, bolts, nuts and so on. With this, Marlito will be able to improve and maintain the good working condition of the motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorcycle, such as wheels, tires, chains, bolts, nuts and so on

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a bakery business in the Philippines. 

She requests 50,000 PHP through NWTF to buy flour, yeast, margarine, and sugar for her bakery business.

Erlinda has been in this business for 1 year and earns additional income from operating a general store.

She sustains her business through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, margarine, and sugar.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora works hard to support her family. She is married and has run a general store in the Philippines for 3 years.

Flora requests 12,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more groceries for her general store. 

In the future, Flora would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jeralyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Jeralyn works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling root crops and vegetables in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Jeralyn is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of root crops to sell in her business.

Jeralyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of root crops to sell

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
Desde hace varios años Marisol quería estudiar, ella quería tener un mejor futuro, pero desafortunadamente ella no contaba con suficiente dinero ni el apoyo de nadie.

Un cierto día dijo, este año voy a estudiar he hizo cuentas de todo lo que se gastaba en casa, al hacer sumas y restas  vio que los hijos necesitaban más cosas para el colegio y ese año decidió no estudiar, ella pensó primero en el estudio de los hijos, en el transcurso de los días conoció personas, ellos  hablaban de las clases y como habían facilidades de pago. Este año vio la oportunidad y ella decide estudiar  esta carrera, a ella le gustaría trabajar en un futuro en los hospitales, ya que hace 2 años trabajo en un hospital en el archivo al lado de urgencias y vio que en la salud necesitan gente con buen servicio, humildad, una mano amiga, ya que en esos momentos es cuando ellos necesitan de la ayuda de los demás, tiene que mirar desde muy adentro del ser que ellos son personas enfermas con necesidades y dificultades y no cuentan con los recursos suficientes. 

Marisol, para poder lograr esto necesita prepararse y estudiar, seguir con los contactos en la rama de la salud, para tener mejores propuestas de trabajo en los hospitales y clínicas y seguir adelante con los hijos y poderles brindar  universidad,  ya que sin un titulo es muy difícil conseguir un trabajo bueno.

Ella agradece  a convenio KIVA para que  la tengan en cuenta, ella necesita del convenio y poder cumplir una meta importante para la vida personal ya que desde muchos años esto es un sueño y ella lo quiere cumplir estudiando administración en salud.
texts.en:
For many years, Marisol has wanted to study. She desires a better future. But unfortunately, she lacks sufficient money or help from anyone.

One day she said “I'm going to study.” Marisol took account of all that was needed in her house and upon adding it all up, she saw that the children needed more resources for attending school and she decided not to study that year. Marisol thought first of her children's studies. But as days passed, she heard persons she knew speak of taking classes and of new facilities to obtain money for payments. 

This year Marisol saw the opportunity and decided to study for a career. She wanted to work in a hospital, since 2 years ago, she had worked in a hospital in the archive next to the emergency room. She saw that in health care, people are needed to offer good service, humility, and a friendly hand. There are moments when people need help from others. One has to look deep inside to recognize that these are sick people with needs and difficulties and they lack sufficient resources.

To be able to do this, Marisol needed to prepare herself, study, and continue her contacts in the health field, if she were to receive better job offers in hospitals and clinics. But she must also continue caring for her children, preparing them for the university, since without a professional title it is very difficult to obtain a good job.

Marisol is grateful for the agreement with Kiva that could help her. With the Kiva loan, she will accomplish an important goal in her personal life. For many years, it has been her dream to finish her studies in health administration.

loans.use: to pay a semester's matriculation fee at Campo Alto.

loans.name: Vy

texts.en:
Vy  is 44 years old and lives in the suburbs of Phnom Penh. She has been married since 1990 and has four children. Three of her children have full-time employment and another child sells clothes. 

Vy is a construction worker and her husband is a construction contractor. Vy’s husband wants to buy additional construction materials for his business. Vy decided to apply for a loan to help her husband purchase the materials.

loans.use: to buy addition construction materials for her husband's business.

loans.name: Marciana

texts.en:
Marciana is a 54-year-old married woman with seven children, three attend school.

She works hard to provide for her family and runs a general store in the Philippines. She requests 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy biscuits, toothpaste, sugar, salt, noodles, and other groceries .

Marciana has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF. She has run the general store for 20 years and earns additional income from food vending.

Marciana aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, toothpaste, sugar, salt, noodles, and other groceries.

loans.name: Carlos Ernesto

texts.es: Carlos es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos, es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultura siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son, maíz y frijol. Carlos desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Carlos is very responsible with his obligations in the home as he has always tried to give his family the best he can.

Carlos currently lives with his wife and children. He is very hard-working, and does his job with joy and enthusiasm. Carlos is a farmer - every year he grows the main basic grains that are found in the region, corn and beans. Carlos wants to increase his sales and so has come to the "Apoyo Integral" office to apply for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, manure, fertilisers, pesticides and other supplies to improve the land (which can be seen in the photo). Carlos would like to have this help as he has no other financial income. With this loan he will be able to continue taking home his daily bread without any problems.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilisers, pesticides and other supplies to improve the land.

loans.name: Genda

texts.en:
Genda is a 45-year-old married woman with two children.  One child  is still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Genda has had a food vending business in the Philippines for 3 years and requests 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, Genda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Hayrullo

texts.ru:
Хайрулло жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый парень в возрасте 23 лет. Он родился в семье рабочих. Хайрулло в настоящее время еще пока холостой парень. Он живет вместе со своими родителями в небольшом посёлке. После окончания средней школы Хайрулло не удалось поступить в университет из-за финансовых трудностей  в семье. Поэтому Хайрулло занимается собственным бизнесом. У него есть собственный автомобиль, и он работает таксистом. Этим делом он занимается вот уже как 3 года и получает приемлемый доход.

Хайрулло самостоятельно трудится и хочет сам сделать всё для улучшения качества своей жизни. Также в семье и отец занимается своим делом. Он занимается купля продажей дров. И сейчас его отец занимается ремонтом их дома, так как в ближайшее время  он собирается женить Хайрулло. А также Хайрулло занимается подготовкой к своей свадьбе. Хайрулло понимает, что в будущем, ему не будет хватать дохода от бизнеса такси. Поэтому он собирается купить большой маршрутный автомобиль, для предоставления более широкого спектра услуг. Но для вождения данного вида автомобиля Хайрулло необходимо получить водительские права категории «D». Поэтому Хайрулло обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на оплату обучения по вождению автомобиля. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Hayrullo is a cheerful and hardworking 23-year old man. He comes from a working class family. Currently, Hayrullo is still a bachelor. He lives with his parents in a small village. After graduating from high school, Hayrullo was unable to go to university because of his family's financial difficulties. Because of this, Hayrullo started his own business. He has his own car and works as a taxi driver. He has been working as a taxi driver for three years and makes a reasonable income. Hayrullo works hard on his own and wants to do everything possible to improve his quality of life. His father is also engaged in business to help the family. He purchases and sells firewood. Now, his father has been repairing the house because he is planning to have Hayrullo marry soon. Hayrullo is preparing for the wedding. Hayrullo understands that, in the future, he will not have enough income from the taxi business. So, he wants to purchase a larger vehicle in order to provide a wider range of services. However, to be able to drive this type of car, Hayrullo will need a category "D" driver's license. Therefore, Hayrullo has turned to Arvand in order to receive a loan to pay for the cost of tuition for driving this type of car. He thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: pay for the tuition costs of getting a class "D" driver license

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.es: Cynthia, de 26 años de edad, es soltera y vive en la casa de sus padres en compañía de sus 2 hermanos de 18 y 17 años de edad. Cynthia se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, para eso cuenta con una tienda que instaló en la casa de sus padres, donde atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes que en su mayoría son su vecinos y ha sabido ganarse sus preferencias por el buen trato que les brinda. Se inició hace más de 03 años en está actividad y hasta el momento lo realiza sola, pero en ocasiones le ayudan sus hermanas en la atención  a los clientes. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable pues sus productos son de primera necesidad y que tiene salida a diario, dando una rotación constante a su capital. En esta oportunidad solicitara S/.2500. Está contenta de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero que necesita para avanzar con su negocio. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra productos comestibles tales como arroz, azúcar, huevos, harina, etc.
texts.en:
Cynthia is 26 years old, single and lives at her parents' house with her two sisters, who are aged 18 and 17 years old. Cynthia makes a living selling consumable goods and so has a shop in her parents' home. There she offers very friendly service to her customers, most of whom are neighbours. Cynthia has gained her customers' loyalty because of the good service that she offers.

Cynthia started her business three years ago. She works alone but, on occasions, her sisters help to serve customers. Cynthia thinks that her business is quite profitable as she sells staple goods that sell every day and have good stock turnover levels. On this occasion Cynthia is applying for a loan of 2500 Nuevo Soles. She is happy to know that she will have the financial support to progress with her business. This loan will be used to buy consumable goods such as rice, sugar, eggs, flour and more.

loans.use: to buy consumable goods such as rice, sugar, eggs, flour and more.

loans.name: Turdukozho

texts.ru: Турдукожо, 53 года, женат, вместе с супругой воспитывают пятерых детей. Образование-среднее. На протяжении 13 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 10,000 сомов (KGS). Он смог развить животноводческую деятельность и на сегодняшний день ежемесячная прибыль составляет 5,000 сомов (KGS).  В хозяйстве у него имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец, а также уже много лет оказывает услуги по выпасу. Супруга на пенсии и помогает по хозяйству. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства Турдукожо уже в четвертый раз обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку бычков. Доходы от кредита Турдукожо планирует направить на увеличение поголовья скота, и в будущем он хочет обучить своих детей.
texts.en: Turdukozho is 53 years old, married, and raising five children. He has a high school education. He has more than 13 years of experience in animal husbandry, having started his business with 10,000 somons (KGS). He was able to develop his livestock business and his current monthly income is 5,000 somons (KGS). His farm has 2 dairy cows, 20 sheep and plenty of land for grazing. His wife is retired and helps with the farm. In order to further develop his business, Turdukozho has, for the fourth time, turned to the Bank "Bai - Tushum" for a loan for the purchase of bulls. Turdukozho plans to use the loan income to increase the number of livestock, and to provide for his children's education in the future.

loans.use: To buy steers

loans.name: Maria Lidia

texts.es: Maria es muy amable y trabajadora, vive con su familia en casa propia, ella se dedica  ala crianza de ganado de engorde en una zona de alto comercio de ganando. Maria solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de concentrado y vitaminas,  entre otras cosas que necesita para seguir con su crianza, ella ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: María is very friendly and hard-working. She lives with her family in a house that they own. María makes a living selling cattle in an area which has a lot of cattle businesses. María is applying for a loan from "Apoyo Integral" in order to have enough money to buy cattle feed, vitamins and other supplies for raising the animals. María is anxious to increase her sales in order to raise profits and offer her family more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Mauricio Antonio

texts.es: Mauricio de 35 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra frijol y maiz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa y sus seis hijos en casa de un familiar. Mauricio  está solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en: Mauricio is 35 years old and has been working in farming for a number of years. He grows beans and corn and, with sales from his harvests, is able to cover household costs. Mauricio is a responsible, honest and hard-working man. He lives with his wife and six children in the family home. Mauricio is applying for a loan in order to buy supplies for his crops, such as fertilisers, manure, seeds and more. Mauricio's earnings are not enough to cover the cost of these supplies; with this loan he can earn more and have more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers, seeds, manure and more.

loans.name: Sopheng

texts.en:
Sopheng, age 19, lives in a village about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She stays at home because she has a newborn child.

Her husband is a motorbike repairman. He does not have his own shop, but is hired by his neighbor.
 
Sopheng has an old motorbike for her family's transportation, but it breaks down. She decided to apply for a loan to buy a new motorbike.

loans.use: to buy a new motorbike for her family's transportation.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a retail dry goods business in the Philippines.  Gina has been in this business for 4 years.

Gina requests 14,000 PHP through NWTF to restock dry goods to sell.

In the future, Gina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more dry goods to sell.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is a 34-year-old married woman with five children.  Four children attend school.

Geraldine has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 7 years and requests 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

 In the future, Geraldine would like to save enough money to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 32 years old and is married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requests 23,000 PHP through NWTF to buy noodles, canned goods, sugar, soap, shampoo, snack foods, and other groceries.

Melanie has borrowed and repaid 4 previous loans from NWTF. She has run the general store for 5 years and earns additional income from loading pre-paid mobile devices .

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy noodles, canned goods, sugar, soap, shampoo, snack foods, and other groceries.

loans.name: Rufila Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rufila de 35 años de edad,  es madre de 6 hijos, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, pero aprendió a escribir gracias a sus hijos. Es casada y ama de casa y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, dos de sus hijos estudian, su esposo se dedica a sembrar sandías. Gracias a que un amigo le dijo que ese cultivo era más rentable que el maíz ya que esto es lo que cultivaba anteriormente en 3 años, durante lo ha hecho dice que le ha ido muy bien. 

El dinero lo necesita para la compra de semilla, abono, pesticidas para su cultivo de sandía, ya que de ahí obtiene los ingresos para su familia y por supuesto dice le agradecería a la Institución por darle la oportunidad de trabajar. A ella le gustaría que sus hijos se superaran y estudiaran aunque ellos dicen que mejor les gustaría trabajar junto a su padre, en vez de estudiar ya que de esa manera sienten que portan para la familia.
texts.en:
Rufila is 35 years old and is the mother of 6 children. She did not have the opportunity to go to school, but she learned to write, thanks to her children. She is married and is a housewife. Her husband works in agriculture. Two of her children are in school. Her husband raises watermelons, thanks to a friend who told him that this crop is more profitable than corn, so this is what he has grown for the last three years, and during this time he says that it has gone very well for him.

She needs the money to purchase seeds, compost, and pesticides for the planting of watermelons, since from this she obtains income for her family, and of course she thanks the institution for giving her the opportunity to work. She would like to have her children go to school and better themselves, although they say that they would like it better to work with their father instead of going to school, since in this way they feel that they contribute to the family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, and pesticides for her watermelon crop

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 21 años de edad vive junto a su familia; el se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, el cliente quiere aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, herramienta, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía, y asi seguir con  su trabajo y seguir ayudando en su casa con los gastos.
texts.en:
The client is 21 years old and lives with his family.  He works in agriculture, specifically growing corn.  He has worked in this field for many years and he has gained valuable experience that allows him to have better harvests.  He sells his harvest in all of the surrounding areas, and he has many regular customers.  These people prefer his products because of their quality and their affordable prices.  Also, his service is unmatched.

The client wants to increase his production, therefore improving his earnings.  He needs to invest in supplies but he does not have the capital, which is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase seed, manure, insecticide, fertilizers, tools, etc, to improve his land that can be seen in the picture.  This will allow him to continue working and continue helping his family with their household expenses.

loans.use: purchase seed, manure, insecticide, fertilizer, tools, etc. to improve his land.

loans.name: Yanira Mariso

texts.es: Doña Yanira se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años su principal siembra es el maiz y frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus venta logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, Don Yanira esta solicitando un credito para poder comparar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: Doña Yanira has worked in agriculture for 10 years. Her principal crops are corn and beans. She sells her crops to agencies for basic grains that are located near her home. With the earnings that she obtains from her sales, she manages to pay some of the expenses that arise in their household. She lives with her husband and her children. Doña Yanira is applying for a loan to be able to buy agricultural supplies that will help her in the raising of her crops, such as compost, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, etc., and thus be able to have better earnings and continue helping with the household expenses without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Sreyor

texts.en:
Sreyor (in photo), age 27, lives in a village across the Mekong River, approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has been married since 2007 and has two young children: one son and one daughter.

Sreyor is a silk weaver, while her husband is a motor taxi driver. She wants to buy her neighboring land to expand her land property, so she decided to apply for a loan.

loans.use: To buy her neighboring land to expand her land property.

loans.name: Rios De Babilonia Group

texts.es: Es un grupo exitoso que ya han trabajado en esta institución financiera, coordinado por la señora María, de 31 años de edad casada, madre de 4 hijos de las edades de 12, 8, 6 años y un bebé de cuatro meses, se dedica a  la compra-venta de frutas de temporada, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de aguacate y tamarindo, para luego comercializarlos en el mercado de la localidad, e impulsar la venta en el mercado más populo de la capital. Los otros socios son la señora Aura de 35 años que elabora delantares y el señor Victor de 20 años que comercializa los perecederos como tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, etc.
texts.en:
This is a successful group that has already worked with this financial institution.  María is their coordinator, she is 31 years old, is married and is the mother of four children ages 12, 8 6 and a four month old baby.  She works buying and selling seasonal fruits.  She will use the loan to purchase avocado and tamarind to later sell in her local market to drive sales in the most populated market in the capital.

The other members are: Aura who is 35 years old and makes aprons, and Visitor who is 20 years old and sells vegetables such as tomatoes, peppers, onions, etc...

loans.use: purchase avocado and tamarind harvests.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 57-year-old woman from Duero, Bohol. She is married with six adult children. 

For six years now, she has been into operating a sari-sari (general) store, selling basic items for her neighbors. This business earn her 4,000 PHP per month. She is asking for a loan to buy candies, chips, toiletries, canned goods, and seasoning. Her profit allow her to buy food and pay for household bills. 

In the future, she hopes to become a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy candies, chips, toiletries, canned goods, and seasoning to sell in her store

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Imelda is 46 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Imelda has a sewing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,500 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials like fabric, buttons, zippers, etc., for her business.

She has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Imelda would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like fabric, buttons, zippers, etc., for her business

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel lives in Murang'a area of Central Kenya with his wife and 5 children. 

He is a well established farmer who has farmed for 39 years. His primary source of income is earned by selling milk, tea,and eggs.  He stated that he enjoys farming because of the income he has earned for many years.

Samuel chose Juhudi Kilimo because he wanted to venture more into farming and Juhudi will help him to fulfill his farming dreams. During the training, he learned how he can improve his farming projects to increase his income. This loan will increase his poultry production and hence lead to a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es:
Lisbeth, de 35 años de edad, está casada con Edver quien es independiente y padre de su hija de 09 años de edad con quienes vive en su casa propia. Lisbeth se dedica a brindar el servicio de cuidado de los dientes, para eso a alquilado un local en donde instaló su pequeña clínica dental, atendiendo de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes ofreciéndoles promociones por sus preferencias, de esa manera está haciendo crecer su cartera de clientes. Se inició hace más de 01 año con un capital propio y con el apoyo de su esposo logra brindar una buena atencion a sus clientes. Considera bastante rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancia que le deja ya que es muy concurrido su pequeña clínica. En esta oportunidad solicitara S/.800. Está contenta y agradecida de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes.
El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de  implementos y materiales para su clínica,  así como inmobiliarios para la recepción y la comodidad de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lisbeth is 35 years old and is married to Edver, the father of her 9 year old daughter.  She lives with them in a house that they own.  Lisbeth works providing dental care, for which she has rented an office where she installed her small dental clinic.  She tends to her patients in a kind and friendly fashion, and offers promotions based on their preferences.  This has allowed her to expand her patient base.  She started her business over a year ago with her own money, and with the help of her husband she is able to provide the proper attention to her patients.  She considers her business to be very profitable based on her earnings since her small clinic is very busy. 

She is taking this opportunity to request a loan of S/ 800.  She is grateful and happy knowing that she will have financial support to realize her plans.  The requested amount will be used to purchase supplies and materials for her clinic as well as furniture for the reception area and her patients' comfort.

loans.use: purchase materials and furniture for her dental clinic.

loans.name: Mhaye

texts.en:
Mhaye is 56 years old, married, and she has children. Her husband is a merchant and farmer. 

Mhaye is taking out a loan for her business. They have a grocery store; they sell all types of basic necessity products. She must travel there every day from her house in order to sell her products. Her husband grows rice and corn throughout the year. They strive to provide the best for their children’s well-being in an honest manner. This loan will be used to restock her store with more products. She will buy provisions, as well as compost for their crops.

Her dreams include having a shop of her own.

loans.use: to buy beverages, snacks and spices for her business

loans.name: Terina

texts.en:
Terina is 43 years old and married.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

Terina has borrowed and repaid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from farming rice.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase materials like wood, nails, paints, etc. for the repair of her fishing boat for her fishing business.

Agnes has been in this business for 10 years. Agnes earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase materials like wood, nails, paints, etc. for the repair of her fishing boat

loans.name: Buraima

texts.ru: Бурайма, 43 года, замужем, имеет шестерых несовершеннолетних детей. У Бураймы среднее образование, более 20 лет назад она с нуля начала свой бизнес и развила его вместе со своим мужем, который занимает руководящую позицию в бизнесе. На сегодняшний день Бурайма имеет в собственности 2 головы дойных коров и 10 голов овец, откорм скота производится в два цикла, непосредственно в хозяйстве и на джайлоо. Также заемщица с семьей обрабатывают 2,0 ГА земли, в основном выращивают арбуз, дыню и хлопок. Прибыль составляет около 20,000 сомов (KGS). Имеются дополнительные доходы в виде пособия на детей в размере 2,500 сомов (KGS) в месяц и арендной платы двух контейнеров на сумму 1,500 сомов (KGS), и квартплаты. Бурайма планирует  приобрести скот: 6 голов овец и 1 теленка, предназначенных для откорма. Часть средств потратит на покупку удобрений и семян. В перспективе Бурайма хочет дать образование детям и завершить ремонт своего дома, все это сможет осуществить лишь при расширении своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Buraima is 43 years old, married and raising six young children. Buraima has a secondary education.  More than 20 years ago, she started her business from nothing and developed it together with her husband, who is in charge of the business. Currently, Buraima owns 2 dairy cows and 10 sheep. She fattens the cattle in two cycles, first on her own farm and then in open fields. There is also a sharecropper who uses 2 hectares of the family land, mostly growing watermelon, melon and cotton. The profit is about 20,000 somons (KGS). There is also additional income in the form of child allowances in the amount of 2,500 som (KGS) per month and rent from two containers in the amount of 1,500 som (KGS) per month. Buraimi plans to purchase cattle: 6 heads of sheep and one calf intended for fattening. Part of the money will be spent on the purchase of fertilizers and seeds. In the future, Buraimi wants to educate her children and to complete the renovation of her home. All this can only be realized with the expansion of her business.

loans.use: To buy sheep

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en:
Vannak (in photo) is 34 years old and lives in a village across the Mekong twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has been married since 2003 and has two sons and one daughter. Two of her children attend school and another one is still young. 

She is a weaver, while her husband is a construction worker. When farming season comes, they also grow lotus for sale. 

Vannak is applying for a loan to buy lotus seed and weaving material.

loans.use: To buy lotus seed and weaving material.

loans.name: Aquilino

texts.es: Aquilino se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su casa,  vive con su familia en casa propia, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comparar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía, asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando el los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
Aquilino has worked in agriculture for many years, which has given him the skills and knowledge needed to care for his crops.  His primary crops are corn and beans, which he sells to basic grain retail agencies that are located near his home.  With his earnings, he is able to cover his household expenses.  He lives with his family in a home that they own.

He is seeking a loan to purchase agricultural supplies that will help him to plant his crops such as manure, seeds, and fertilizers to improve the land that can be seen in the photograph.  This will allow him to improve his earnings and continue to help with his household expenses without limitations.

loans.use: purchase manure, seeds, fertilizers and improve the land.

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosario tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos de 7 años, 8 años, 9 años y 11 años de edad. Rosario se gana la vida por medio de la venta de verduras y productos de belleza por catalogo de forma ambulante. Todos los días recorre las principales zonas de su localidad para ofrecer los productos y cada ves son más los clientes que se acercan para demandar los productos. Desea reparar lo antes posible el techo de su vivida dado que se encuentra en mal estado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para proceder al cambio del techo y así brindar mejores condiciones habitacionales a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosario is 33 years old and lives with her four children, ages 7, 8, 9 and 11, in a house that she owns.  Rosario earns a living as a street vendor selling vegetables and beauty products from a catalog.  She makes her rounds everyday through the main areas of her city, offering her products, and every time more customers approach her to purchase her products.  

She wishes to repair the roof of her home as soon as possible because it is in poor shape.  For this reason, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to purchase galvanized sheet metal and wood to replace the roof, and provide her children with better living conditions.

loans.use: purchase galvanized sheet metal and wood to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Sarin

texts.en:
Sarin (pictured) lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has five children: one son and four daughters. 

Sarin sells fish. She buys fish from and sells it in a market that is about four kilometers from her house. Her husband is assisting his wife in the business.  

Sarin wants to renovate the house where she lives and build a concrete brick room, but she does not have money. That’s why she decided to apply for a loan!

loans.use: To renovate the house where she lives and build a concrete brick room.

loans.name: Getsemani Group

texts.es: Es un grupo de mujeres trabajadoras y exitosas, coordinado por la señora Dominga de 49 años de edad, soltera y madre de cinco hijos de los cuales ninguno depende ella, se dedica a la venta de comida especialmente baho, siendo este un platillo muy degustado por la población en general, todos los fines de semana y cuenta con la ayuda de una de su hijas para la elaboración de dicha comida, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de yuca, maduro, carne de res, repollo, tomate, cebolla, ajo, y otros ingredientes. Tenemos a las  otras socias, como es la señora Martha de 44 años, quién compra y vende zapatos y cosa de hornos, por último tenemos a la señora María de 71 años, propietaria de una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This is a group of hard-working, successful women, coordinated by Señora Dominga. She is 49 years old, single, and the mother of five children, none of whom depend on her. She sells food, especially baho [a traditional Nicaraguan dish steamed in banana leaves], which is a dish that is very much savored by the people in general every weekend. She has the help of one of her daughters to make this dish. She needs the loan to purchase yucca, plantains, beef, cabbage, tomatoes, onions, garlic, and other ingredients.

We have the other members, such as Martha, who is 44. She buys and sells shoes and corn cakes. Finally, we have Señora Maria, who is 71 and is the proprietor of a grocery store in her home.

loans.use: to purchase yucca, plantains, beef, cabbage, tomatoes, onions, garlic, and other ingredients

loans.name: Jennet

texts.en:
Jennet is a married 43-year-old woman with four children, three of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Jennet has a business buying and selling dried fish in the Philippines. Jennet requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional quantities of dried fish to sell.

Jennet has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Jennet would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional quantities of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Amelia works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling used clothes in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Amelia is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell for her used clothes business.

Amelia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food products such as rice, sugar, milk, and beverages, among other items

loans.name: Aida

texts.ru: Аиде 33 года, она замужем и имеет четверых детей, дети школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Аиды среднее образование, долгие годы, а точнее с 1998 года, она занимается сельским хозяйством. На начальном этапе у заемщицы была только одна корова, но сегодня она имеет в хозяйстве 4 головы дойных коров, 1 лошадь и 10 овец, что приносит ей прибыль в 20,000 сомов (KGS) в месяц. Также Аида занимается полеводством, выращивает кукурузу, рис, овощи. Скот в летний период отгоняет на джайлоо, а в зимний содержит в хозяйстве, для чего созданы все условия на территории дома. Супруг Аиды имеет среднее образование и активно помогает ей в ведении бизнеса. В Банк "Бай-Тушум" обращается в первый раз, она планирует  купить коров. Расширение хозяйства позволит заемщице улучшить условия проживания.
texts.en: Aida is 33 years old, married and has four school- and preschool-aged children. Aida has had a secondary education for many years; from 1998, she has engaged in agriculture. At first, she only had one borrowed cow, but today her farm has 4 dairy cows, 1 horse and 10 sheep that brings her a profit of 20,000 som (KGS) per month. Aida also farms corn, rice and vegetables. In the summer, she brings the cattle to the fields. In the winter, she keeps them on the farm, where she has created all the necessary conditions. Aida's spouse has a secondary education and actively helps her with her business. She has turned to the Bank "Bai-Tushum" for the first time in order to buy cows. Expanding her farm will allow her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Amonidin

texts.ru: Амонидин старый сельский житель района Вахш с высшим образованием. Он работает в налоговой инспекции своего района. Одновременно в течение 18 лет Амонидин занимается земледелием, как и все жители села. Амонидин живет в своем селе с женой, детьми, невестками и внуками. Ему 68 лет, но он чувствует себя хорошо и до сих пор продолжает работать. Обстоятельства заставили Амонидина обратиться за кредитом. Дело втом, что его внук Собирчон очно учится в первом курсе Государственного Университета города Кургантюбе в факультете "Технология". При поступлении внука Амонидин сам помогал внуку. Теперь он хочет оплатить за остальные три года обучения вперед, так как с каждым годом цена за обучение повышается и им в будущем будет трудно с оплатой. Так как Амонидин дальновидный человек, он учел эти факты и решил взять кредит. Он любит внука и хочет, чтобы он без финансовых трудностей окончил университет.
texts.en: Amonidin is an elderly villager from the Vakhsh region. He has a higher education. He works in the tax office of the district. At the same time, he has been working as a farmer for 18 years, like all the other villagers. Amonidin lives in the village with his wife, children, in-laws and grandchildren. He is 68 years old, but still feels good and continues to work. Circumstances have forced Amonidin to apply for a loan. The thing is that his grandson Sobirchon has been studying in his freshman year at the State University of Kurgan in the Technology department. When he started school, Amonidin was helping pay by himself. Now, he wants to pay for the remaining three years of tuition, as the price of tuition increases every year and it will be difficult for him to pay in the future. Since Amonidin is a man who plans ahead, he has taken these factors into account and decided to request a loan. He loves his grandson and wants him to be able to complete his university studies without financial difficulties.

loans.use: to pay for the next three years of his grandson's university tuition

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Meet Regina, a farmer living in the Murang'a area of Central Kenya. She lives with her husband and three children, all of whom are school-aged. She has been doing farming for the past 15 years and it has really increased her income. Her primary income source is eggs, tea, maize and vegetables. Her greatest challenge is insufficient money for boosting her projects.

Regina chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they assist farmers with asset financing in order to undertake their projects easily. During the training, she learned about keeping track of repayment. This loan will uplift their living standards by selling milk from the dairy goats.

loans.use: for purchasing dairy goats.

loans.name: Sokim

texts.en:
Sokim is a 36-year-old woman who lives in Svay Check district, Banteay Meanchey. She is a very responsible, loving mother of a single child who attends school. Her husband and child help with cultivating rice, especially during the rainy season from May to October. She also works as a day laborer for additional income. She has been involved in farming for nearly 20 years.

Sokim will use her loan to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of her family members. This will improve her household sanitation practices. Thanks to the water loan program, with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Sokim is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for her family.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 20-year-old single man from Gaza city. He lives with his family in a small, simple house. His father has a small store for selling old outlet clothes. Ahmad helps his father in his store. He would like to improve the store and also his family's living conditions. 
Ahmad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more clothes for his father's store to resell. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to increase sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for his store to resell

loans.name: Sokun

texts.en:
Sokun is 29 years old and lives in a village approximately 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has three children, a son and two daughters. Two of her children attend school and another one is too young for school. 
Sokun is a garment factory worker while her husband is a truck driver. She is asking for a loan to buy a motorbike to drive to work.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle to drive to work.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maiz y frijol. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año. Es una mujer muy trabajadora, honrada y responsable.  Siempre está al pendiente de su familia ya que para ella es su principal fuente de inspiración y desea poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito ya que la temporada en la que se realiza la siembra, se aproxima, y quiere estar preparada con los principales insumos agrícolas como: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. que es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Dora is 38 years old and lives in her own home with her family.  She works growing corn and beans.  In this way she earns a living and is able to bring food to her household each day.  Her farming activity is done year after year.  She is a hard-working, honorable, and responsible woman.  She is always caring for her family since they are her main source of inspiration and why she wants to improve her living conditions.  He has make the decision to approach Kiva in order to request a loan since the season for planting is arriving and she wants to be ready with the best feed for her crops, including: fertilizer, insecticides, seeds, etc.  This is the reason she is requesting a loan.  She hopes to have favorable results since she does not have any other means of income.  She has faith in God that she will achieve her objective of an abundant harvest which will allow her to continue providing food for her family.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer, insecticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 42 years old and is a mother who has gotten ahead with children living with her in her own home. She works selling fresh fish in the mornings. Her work begins at dawn as she heads to the fishing port in her town to buy goods directly from fishermen wholesalers. She then takes the fish to her stall which is located in a crowded market. 

Rosemarie began more than three years ago with her own capital. Seeing that it was an easy job to do, and there was ample demand, she decided to devote herself completely to developing her business. Since then, she has maintained her initial investment. 

Seeing the good results she gets, she hopes to see her business grow and increase her capital. This time she is requesting 43,000 PHP and is grateful for the opportunity that the lenders offer for progress with her plans. 

With the requested amount, she will buy fresh fish in greater quantities of the different species that are in higher demand.

loans.use: to buy fish for her business

loans.name: Isabelo

texts.en:
Isabelo is a 54-year-old man from Valencia, Bohol. He is married with four children, three of whom are adults and his youngest is 14 years old.  For a year now he has been raising hogs for a living. This earns him 3,000 PHP per month. He is asking for a loan to buy feed and piglets.

In the future, he hopes to expand his business and be more successful.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets

loans.name: Teresiah

texts.en:
Teresiah is 43 years old from Nyandarua South and is married. She and her husband have four children, ages 11 to 25.

Teresiah has a farming business that she has been running for many years. She has applied for her second loan from VisionFund Kenya to enable her to buy more calves for grazing.

She hopes to improve her business in the near future.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Sopio

texts.en:
Sopio, is a 23-year-old woman who lives in the Bolnisi district. She lives with her parents, grandparents and brother and his family. The family members, except her grandparents, are employed at private companies and have fixed salaries. In spite of her high education, Sopio couldn't find a stable job and decided to start her own business. She requested a loan from MFO Credo and was approved for the start-up program that gives people a chance to start or re-start businesses. She will open a clothing store with the requested money, purchase a stock of clothing and rent the place at the center of Bolnisi. 
After the store is opened, Sopio will have a stable income which will enable her to cover everyday costs as well as expand the business in the future.  With support of the start-up program, Sopio will get an opportunity to be involved in her own business and tackle the financial difficulties. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To open clothing store

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is a 35-year-old married mother of three. She is a businesslady in Mwingi who earns her living by selling chicken. She has been successfully selling chicken for the past three years and earns a monthly income of 10,000 KES which she uses to support her family. 

She is requesting her first loan from VisionFund Kenya in order to buy more chicken for resale. With the additional income, she will reinvest in the business and pay school fees for her children. 

Nelly hopes and dreams of further establishing her business to an extent that she can venture into other businesses to add to her profits.

loans.use: to buy more chicken for resale

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es:
Cruz es una mujer de 62 años de edad, madre de 8 hijos,  no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a que se crecieron en un lugar lejos de la población y no habían escuelas. Ella es casada y tiene 8 hijos, todos son mayores y sólo uno vive con ellos, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, siembra 35,000 metros cuadrados de sandia. Se ha dedicado a este trabajo desde 1980, cuando llegaron al lugar y vieron que la mayoría de habitantes se dedicaban a sembrar sandías, vieron resultados de tal actividad y ahora son conocidos como los que obtienen las mejores cosechas del lugar.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar abono, foliares, alquiler de la tierra, pesticidas y pago de mano de obra; dice que el crédito le ayudará a llevar a cabo esta labor un año más y piensa seguir trabajando mientras se le de la oportunidad. Ella se siente a gusto porque sus hijos aprendieron el trabajo de la agricultura y ahora tienen sus propios hogares y se siente orgullosa de eso.
texts.en:
Cruz is 62 years old, married, and the mother of 8 children, all of whom are grown. Only one lives with them.  She did not have the opportunity to get an education because she grew up in a remote region where there were no schools. Her husband is a farmer and grows watermelon on approximately 300 acres of land. He has been doing this since 1980 when they arrived here and saw that most of the people were growing watermelon. They were successful in this endeavor and are known today as obtaining the best harvest in the region. 

The loan she is requesting is to buy manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and to pay for labor and rental of the land. She states that the loan will allow them to continue farming for another year, and she wants to continue to work as long as she has the opportunity to do so. 

She feels satisfied and proud because her children learned to be farmers and now they have their own homes.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and to pay for labor and rental of the land.

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: Maritza de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz, fríjol, etc. desde hace varios  años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, sus cosechas las comercializa en los mercados de granaos básicos con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Maritza solicita un crédito para poder mejorar el terreno donde piensa hacer su siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y asi ella pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en:
Maritza is 36 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She makes a living from cultivating maize, beans, etc., and has done so for several years, which has given her the necessary experience to tend to her crops. She sells these in the basic grains markets, and uses her income in order to pay for her home expenses.

Maritza is requesting a loan in order to improve the land where she plans to plant, which is shown in the photograph, and to buy the necessary supplies, such as fertiliser, herbicides and manure, among others, so as to have a good harvest and to increase her income. In this manner she will be able to give her family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser, herbicides, and manure, among others

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of nine children from Talibon, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari (variety store) business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Divina is also engaged in the retail sale of seafood products. This is the source of her income.

Divina is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soap, toiletries, soda, beverages, and seafood products. With this loan, she will be able to improve her stock, thus attracting more buyers to her store. 

In the future, Divina hopes of making her business a success. Moreover, she wants to save money to pay for the school expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soap, toiletries, soda, beverages, and seafood products

loans.name: Hun

texts.en:
Hun is 30 years old, married, and a loving mother of two children. She is a hardworking woman that works in agriculture. She has various parcels of land on which she primarily grows seasonal crops. Her harvest and products are sold in the local markets. She has been in this field for almost 15 years, earning a decent income for her family. Hun has great support from her husband.

By applying for this loan, Hun will use the money to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of her family members. She would like to improve the household sanitation practices. 

Thanks to the water loan program and a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Hun is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank

loans.name: Josphine

texts.en:
Josphine is a 37-year-old, married woman who is blessed with two children. She runs a pharmacy businesses in Awasi, Kisumu County. She is served by VisionFund Kenya, Kapsabet Branch.

Josephine has been in this business for the last five years, earning an average monthly profit of KES 50,000. She has borrowed a loan of KES 73,000 that will be used to purchase more pharmaceutical drugs. This will increase her business stock and profits.

With the anticipated profits, she will repay her loan, pay for her children's school fees, and improve her living standards. Her dream is to provide the best education for her children and expand her business to the point where she can meet her financial obligations without difficulty. She would also like to employ a member of her community to assist in running the business.

loans.use: to purchase pharmaceutical drugs for resale.

loans.name: Boniface

texts.en: Boniface used his previous loan to buy a motorcycle for a transportation business.  It has been successful and he would like to buy another motorcycle.  This will enable him to expand his business and increase his profits. This is his third loan term, having successfully repaid his previous loans.  In the future, he hopes to be successful in his business.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Rodrique

texts.en: Rodrique is a Cameroonian man.  He is 32 years old and married with three children.  The oldest child is six years old and in primary school, while the youngest is one. He has been in this business for over six years, which makes him very experienced with a stable business. His business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. This loan will be used to increase his turnover by twenty-five percent.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, mineral water, beer, powder, soap, and bread.

loans.name: Pamella

texts.en:
Pamella is a 33-year-old lady from Kakamega county, married to Jacob, who is also a businessman in the same town.  They have two children, ages 10 and 7.

She operates a food stall selling vegetables, a business she has done for the last three years, earning an average income of KES 3,500 per month. 

She is taking her second loan of KES 10,000 with VisionFund Kenya to use in buying fish to expand her business.

The profits will be used to repay the loan and do some savings.

Her dream is to prosper.

loans.use: to expand her business by incorporating fish in her sales

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 22 años de edad vive junto con su familia en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol  tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia producto de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, el se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir quiere aumentar la producción, pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, fertilizante, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. asi como muestra la fotografia. El cliente  tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The 22-year-old client lives with his family in their house. He works farming corn and beans. He has worked in agriculture for many years and thus has much experience in the industry and is well-known in the area. He already has a good clientele since he gets the best crops and therefore provides first quality product at very affordable prices. In addition, the service is unbeatable: he is distinguished by his great friendliness.

He is an enterprising man who is eager to get ahead, but he needs financial support. That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral, which will allow him to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control products, herbicides, etc., as the photograph shows. The client has endorsements as being of high moral character, responsible, and well-paid. He is sure that he will be able to repay the debt and to continue helping his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pesticide, herbicide, etc

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a 34-year-old gentleman from Kisumu, married to Helen, who is also a business lady in the same town.  They have two children, ages 6 and 12.

He has rented out chairs in the market as his business for the last 14 years, earning an average income of KES 24,000 per month. 

He is taking his third loan of KES 100,000 with VisionFund Kenya to use to buy more seats in bulk. 

The profits will be used to repay the loan and do some savings.

His dream is to prosper.

loans.use: to buy more chairs to rent in the market

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel de 58 años de edad,  se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz y frijol, se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 7 años y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás,  debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse, es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde quiere realizar sus siembras que es el que muestra la fotografía. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que él consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Fidel, 58 years old, is a farmer who cultivates corn and beans. He has been engaged in this work for 7 years and this is how he earns his daily bread. He is a hardworking, responsible man who is very well known in the area for his big heart and kindness to others. 

Because it is already the planting season, Fidel has decided to get prepared. Thus he decided to request this new loan from INTEGRAL in order to purchase seeds, compost, insecticides, etc and improve the land where he intends to plant. His field is shown in the photo. What he most desires is for his harvest to be abundant and better than previous ones, since this is the way he is able to support his family. He believes that with God’s help and his own dedication and hard work he will fulfill his dream of improving his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost, insecticides, etc. and improve his plot of land.

loans.name: Mt Rungwe Group

texts.en:
Omary, who in his early 50s, is married with three children who are still at school. He has been selling charcoal for six years now. He works from 6 am to 6 pm daily, and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Omary's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to buy charcoal and has paid back his loan successfully. 

He appreciates Kiva for supporting their group, and he said he can now smile with his family.  

He used the profit to pay school fees and household expenses. 

He will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal to meet his customers' demand.   

He dreams of renovating the shop so that it looks attractive to customers.

Omary will share this loan with his loan group, "Mt Rungwe", which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to meet his customers' demand.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es:
María de 37 años de edad, estudio solamente primero de primaria,  esta acompañada y tiene 3 hijos su pareja se dedica a la agricultura,  dos de sus hijos viven con ella, no estudian una es mayor y el otro tiene una enfermedad  en la cabeza.

María toda su vida a tenido que depender de la agricultura,  ya que es la herencia que le dejaron sus padres aprender a trabajar  y ser responsable, el dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar abono, foliares, alquiler de la tierra, pesticidas y pago de mano de obra  que necesita para que su compañero de vida trabaje.  A ella le gustaría que su hijo aprenda a trabajar para que cuando depende de sí mismo no tenga dificultades para salir adelante.
texts.en:
María, who is 37 years old, has only a first grade education. She lives with her partner, who is a farmer, and has three children. Two of them live with her but they aren't in school. One is an adult and the other is disabled.

María has had to depend on farming all her life, since that is the legacy she inherited from her parents, who taught her to work hard and to be responsible. She needs the money from this loan to buy fertilizer, foliar products, and pesticides, to pay rent, and to pay for the labor she needs in order for her life partner to work. She would like her son to learn how to work so that when he becomes independent he doesn't have problems getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, foliar products, and pesticides, pay rent, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase compost and liquid fertilizer, rent land, buy pesticides and pay for day laborers so she can continue working.

loans.name: José Irene

texts.es:
José tiene 56 años de edad, es agricultor  solamente estudio hasta segundo grado de básica, está casado  y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen 9 hijos, cuatro de ellos aún viven con él y su pareja.

 José se ha dedicado desde su niñez a la agricultura  y aprendió de su padre y abuelo está sembrando 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, además se dedica  a la comercialización de ganado y tienen 100 pollos de engorde para la venta.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar una vaca, ya que cuenta con una parte del dinero y con el crédito lo va complementar.


Desea poder reproducir la vaca para empezar con una pequeña ganadería y esta vaya aumentando poco a poco y a futuro tener una ganadería lechera y espera que sus hijos sean profesionales  terminando sus estudios.
texts.en:
José is a 56-year-old farmer. He only studied until the second grade of grammar school. He is married and his wife handles the domestic chores. They have nine children, four of whom still live with them.

José has been working in agriculture since childhood, which he learned from his father and grandfather. He is planting 14,000 square meters of corn, and is also engaged in the marketing of livestock with 100 fattened chickens for sale.

He is requesting a loan from CREDICAMPO to buy a cow to complement some money he has now. 

José wishes to breed the cow to start a small livestock which will grow over time and to have a dairy farm in the future. He hopes for his children to become professionals and complete their studies.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es: Cristina es una mujer activa y emprendedora de 27 años de edad, residente en una vereda del municipio de Bello, vive con sus tíos, quienes le enseñaron todo el manejo y cuidado de terneras; gracias a sus conocimientos y motivada por su novio, desea comenzar su propio negocio de cría y comercialización de ganado vacuno, es por ello que solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que comprará 3 terneras y concentrado para alimentar los animales. Esto le permitirá a Cristina generar ingresos adicionales para solventar sus gastos personales y avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su mayor anhelo que es sacar adelante este negocio para que sea auto sostenible y le garantice una estabilidad financiera favorable que le ayude a mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Cristina is an active and entrepreneurial woman of 27 years of age living in rural Bello. She lives with her aunt and uncle, who have taught her everything to manage and care for calves. Thanks to this knowledge and motivated by her boyfriend, she wants to start her own business raising and selling cattle. For this reason, she is requesting the support of a loan with which she will purchase 3 calves and concentrated feed for the animals. This will allow her to generate additional income to settle her personal expenses and make progress pursuing her deepest wish, which is to succeed with this business to the point where it becomes self-sustaining and guarantees her financial stability to help her improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy three calves and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase products, such as perfume and clothing for men, women and children.

loans.name: Sokrin

texts.en:
Sokrin (pictured here) is a weaver, while her husband is a security guard. She lives on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Sokrin has five children, three sons and two daughters. Three children have full-time employment and the other two are in school.
 
Sokrin is asking for a loan to purchase a motorbike for her son to drive work. Because he does not have his own motorbike, he commutes to work by often asking his friends or neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her son to drive to work.

loans.name: Mafinga Group

texts.en:
Anneth, who is in her late 30s, is married with three children who are still at school.  She has been running a business of decorating and baking cakes. She has been in this business for seven years now and is able to make a good monthly profit. When Anneth has a cake to bake and decorate, she starts work at 6 am and finishes at 6 pm. 

Anneth is requesting a second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan, which was repaid successfully, to buy cake stands, which she normally uses when baking and presenting cakes to customers. Anneth received extra income which she used to cover part of the school fees and home food expenses. She dreams that one day she will be able to own her own rental hall. Anneth will use this loan to buy chairs for the bride and bridegroom and flour and other cake-making ingredients. 

Anneth will share this loan with her loan group "Mafinga" which totals three members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy chairs for the bride and bridegroom, flour and other cake-making ingredients.

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is 23 years old and a resident of Valencia, Bohol. She is married and has two children ages 1 and 2.

Ailyn operates a sari-sari where she sell basic household needs like noodles, canned goods, soft drinks, seasonings, toiletries and chips. Her business started two years ago and earns her 4,000 PHP per month. 

Ailyn is asking for a loan to buy stocks of candies, bath soap, shampoo, sugar, cooking oil and chips. 
 
Ailyn  hopes that with additional capital, she can make a better profit from her business and save for the future of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of candies, bath soap, shampoo, sugar, cooking oil and chips.

loans.name: Yat

texts.en:
Yat is a weaver, while her husband is a construction worker. She has been married since 2007 and has one daughter who is in school. She is living on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Yat is in the process of building a new house to live in (in picture), but some parts of her house are not finished yet especially the staircase. Hence she applied for a loan in order to finish building her house.

loans.use: to finish building her house.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is a married, 30-year-old businessman in Thika. He is married to Hannah and together they are blessed with a 2-year-old baby. Simon operates a motorcycle transport business. He has operated the motorcycle transport business for the past three years. He earns a monthly income of KES 17,700 which he uses to support himself and his family. 

This marks his second loan term with VIisionFund Kenya after repaying his previous loan successfully. With this loan, he will be able to purchase a new motorcycle. Additional income generated will allow him to buy enough food for his family. 

In the future, Simon would like to expand his motorcycle business further. He hopes to buy a public service vehicle and become an established businessman.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle.

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer is a 50-year-old wardrobe designer in Mombasa, Kenya. She is a married mother of four adults and has been in this business for the last six years and is doing great.

This marks her third borrowing from VisionFund Kenya after repaying the previous loans successfully. She will use this loan to purchase African design clothing material for resale. She will use the anticipated profit to service her loan and provide for her family. She hopes to own a boutique in future.

loans.use: to purchase African design clothing material for resale.

loans.name: Noel De Jesús

texts.es:
